SELECT iorder, rdt, order_status, pre_order_status FROM t_order
WHERE rdt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND date_add(#{toDate}, interval +1 day) AND cdt is null
WHERE cdt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND date_add(#{toDate}, interval +1 day)
AND iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY iorder DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT B.nm, B.product_code, C.color, C.hdd, B.brand, C.ssd, C.price, D.quantity, C.img, D.result_price, C.idetail FROM t_order A INNER JOIN t_order_product D ON A.iorder = D.iorder INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON D.idetail = C.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master B ON C.iproduct = B.iproduct WHERE A.iorder = #{iorder} ORDER BY cdt DESC

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iorder) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_order
WHERE rdt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND date_add(#{toDate}, interval +1 day)
WHERE cdt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND date_add(#{toDate}, interval +1 day)
AND iuser = #{iuser}

SELECT A.iorder, A.rdt, A.order_status, A.pre_order_status, B.receiver_nm, A. result_price, A.spent_point, A.payment_way, A.cdt, B.receiver_phone, B.receiver_post, B.receiver_addr, B.receiver_addr_detail, B.shipment_message FROM t_order A INNER JOIN t_order_detail B ON A.iorder = B.iorder WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND A.iorder = #{iorder}
